about_the_game:
Pixels N Pistols is all about gaining a positional advantage over your cute, little, (surprisingly violent) pixel enemies and sending them to the void with an arsenal of over 40 weapons. Quick thinking and keen awareness are required to take out the highly trained semi-intelligent soldiers you will be facing in battle.

Over 40 Weapons
Equip Rocket Launchers, Submachine Guns, Assault Rifles, Molotovs, IEDs, Knives, Sawed-Off Shotty's, Light Machine Guns, Grenades, Combat Drones, Magical Artifacts, and Pistols (duh) as your primary and secondary weapons. Send lead beams of self-righteousness and cleansing fire straight through your opposition who are probably the bad guys.

Environments
Fight your way through a variety of maps and lighting conditions. Play in the dark for an added challenge or to RP that you are at a rave. Equip Night Vision goggles or use your flashlight to see where that ******* Frank is hiding.


Semi-Intelligent AI
The AI will engage you in intense firefights that may leave you with lifelong(ingame time) trauma or no life at all. Enemies will take cover, camp at vantage points, tactically retreat, and rush you head on. Keep your head on a swivel to avoid being turned into pixel soup by snipers, radicalized 9-5ers, and ninjas.


Bullet Penetration
Bullets can penetrate furniture, riot shields, doors, body armor, and various objects in your environment depending on the weapon you choose. Don't get too comfortable hiding behind that flipped table.

Get Tactical
You can either play this game as a wild 2D deathmatch simulator or a more methodical and unforgiving CQC game depending on what suits your preference. Upping the difficulty, dimming the lights, enabling survival mode, and engaging in squad battles will force you to start using that noggin of yours.

Outsmart your Enemies
Every encounter with an enemy is like a small, rapidly evolving puzzle. Use your wits to take up an advantageous position to snipe or rush an enemy while they are most vulnerable.


Zombonies
They're vicious. They're stupid. They have ridiculous names. And they're coming for you. Use half your wits to dispatch a horde of hungry yeller N green fellers from feasting on your sweet cheeks.


Tailor Your Experience
Change the settings to increase difficulty, dim the lighting, enable survival mode, change the amount of soldiers, available air support, score limit, Wizards. player/soldier loadouts, change team uniform colors, make a really boring 1v1 on a large map, start a FFA squad battle, face zombies, or any combination of settings you're into. Whether it's sniping from a rooftop, gunning down your enemies head on, or coercing your loved ones to buy this game, Play Your Way.

content_descriptors.notes: Includes shooting enemies, zombies, blood, detached limbs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Take aim at cute little (blood thirsty) pixel enemies and send them to the void with an arsenal of over 40 weapons. Fight against soldiers, zombies, ninjas, Wizards, and both the living and undead versions of Fascist Frank.
